scripts.build:osx: node .scripts/download --platform=darwin --arch=x64 && node .scripts/prepare --platform=darwin --arch=x64 && npm run clean:osx && electron-packager ./.app "$npm_package_name" --out=.dist/osx/x64 --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=$npm_package_electron_version --icon=$npm_package_icns --ignore="$npm_package_ignore_files"
scripts.build:linux:x86: node .scripts/download --platform=linux --arch=x86 && node .scripts/prepare --platform=linux --arch=x86 && npm run clean:linux:x86 && electron-packager ./.app "$npm_package_name" --out=.dist/linux/x86 --platform=linux --arch=ia32 --version=$npm_package_electron_version --icon=$npm_package_ico --ignore="$npm_package_ignore_files"
scripts.build:linux:x64: node .scripts/download --platform=linux --arch=x64 && node .scripts/prepare --platform=linux --arch=x64 && npm run clean:linux:x64 && electron-packager ./.app "$npm_package_name" --out=.dist/linux/x64 --platform=linux --arch=x64 --version=$npm_package_electron_version --icon=$npm_package_ico --ignore="$npm_package_ignore_files"
scripts.build:win:x86: node .scripts/download --platform=win32 --arch=x86 && node .scripts/prepare --platform=win32 --arch=x86 && npm run clean:win:x86 && electron-packager ./.app "$npm_package_name" --out=.dist/windows/x86 --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=$npm_package_electron_version --icon=$npm_package_ico --version-string.CompanyName="$npm_package_company" --version-string.ProductVersion="$npm_package_version" --version-string.ProductName="$npm_package_name" --ignore="$npm_package_ignore_files"
scripts.build:win:x64: node .scripts/download --platform=win32 --arch=x64 && node .scripts/prepare --platform=win32 --arch=x64 && npm run clean:win:x64 && electron-packager ./.app "%npm_package_name%" --out=.dist/windows/x64 --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=%npm_package_electron_version% --icon=%npm_package_ico% --version-string.CompanyName="%npm_package_company%" --version-string.ProductVersion="%npm_package_version%" --version-string.ProductName="%npm_package_name%" --ignore="%npm_package_ignore_files%"
scripts.osx: npm run build:osx && npm run pack:osx
scripts.win: npm run build:win && npm run pack:win
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run testonly
